name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
schedule:
Wk1    Orientation / Understanding Style
Wk2    Writing Abstracts
Wk3    Problem-Solution Essays
Wk4    Correctness (I)
Wk5    Correctness (II)
Wk6    Actions (I)
Wk7    Holiday-No Class 
Wk8    Actions (II)/Characters (I)
Wk9     Characters (II)
Wk10   Emphasis
Wk11   Concision
Wk12   Cohesion & Coherence
Wk13   Shape 
Wk14   Motivation (I)
Wk15   Motivation (II)/Writing Reviews (I)
Wk16   Writing Reviews (II) 
Wk17   The Ethics of Style/Recapitulation
Wk18   Fina Exam
scorePolicy:
Quizzes　　　　　　　　20%
Homework　　　　　　40%  
Class Activities　　　　20%
Final Exam　　　　　　20%
materials:
Bizup, Joseph and Joseph M. Williams. 2014. Style: Lessons in Clarity and Grace. Eleventh Edition.
Angell, Roger. 2000. The Elements of Style. 4th Edition. New York: Longman.
